item.title: Warren Buffett offered this timely investment advice after a tumultuous April for equities
item.description: The Berkshire Hathaway CEO had some wise words for investors before announcing that he intends to step down.

item.title: IBM thinks that over a billion new applications will be built with gen AI : Here’s how they’re going to help that happen with agentic AI
item.description: IBM details its plans to help enterprises to actually do more with AI, with an expanded set of agentic AI capabilities.

item.title: My friend’s partner is pregnant, but she’s married to another man. Is he financially responsible?
item.description: “She claimed her husband was cheating on her and stopped paying their mortgage.”

item.title: Meta, Cisco put open-source LLMs at the core of next-gen SOC workflows
item.description: Cisco’s Foundation-sec-8B LLM & Meta’s AI Defenders redefine cybersecurity with open-source AI for scalable SOCs.

item.title: Here’s where Demi Moore gets a good night’s sleep: Her $3.6 million lakeside home in Idaho
item.description: Moore has a much quieter retreat away from the hustle and bustle of Los Angeles: a stunning lakehouse in Aspen Lakes, Idaho.
